ygData.subject: Re: Dungeon advice
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yeah, I got two bubbles in 6ish hours including two deaths (level 34, in L.Guk, camping savant with mid-40s, for those who have lost this thread...). I ve
ygData.messageBody:
James Schuldes wrote:
>
> From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>
> I think you answered your own question - did you end the night with a good
> amount of xp _gained_??? I think not. Not with 2 or 3 deaths.
>

Yeah, I got two bubbles in 6ish hours including two deaths (level 34, in L.Guk,
camping savant with mid-40s, for those who have lost this thread...).

I've never fought anything so red that I didn't get credit, mostly because I'm
chicken. I didn't realize this could happen - thanks for the warning.

I find it interesting that you like to be among the highest-ranked in the group.
I'm exactly the opposite. I much prefer to be one of the lowest-ranked. Yeah,
I'm weaker, it's much easier for the MOBs to kill me, and it's much harder to
run, but it seems to me that they target me a LOT less. Whenever I'm among the
highest-ranked, I get pounded incessantly. I'm curious how others feel about
it.

I consider it good when I can net a bubble in 3-4 hours, so perhaps I'm not as
demanding as you! ;)

Kenross Cantoforjado, 34 songs, Innoruuk
